palette.title: s i t u a t i o n s
palette.description:
"Situations" (J. Johnson)
Situation Number one Its the one that's just begun But evidently its too late Situation Number two Its the only chance for you It's controlled by denizens of hate Situation Number three It's the one that no one sees All too often dismissed as fate Situation Number four The one that left you wanting more Tantalized you with its bait
